post.desc:
**YOU** – "Magic," huh? Really makes me wonder what Byakuren had to do in order to become such a grand magician...

**ENCYCLOPEDIA** – Is it really just from reading some books? Witchcraft was taboo not just because it's witchcraft. It's also because people who actually – and not allegedly, as they pretty much were for most IRL cases – practiced it were doing some really nasty stuff.

**HALF LIGHT** – She's got blood on her hands.

**VOLITION** – Again, you're letting [**Hungry Tiger**](https://mangadex.org/title/766ee74b-95f8-446b-bd1a-0d51c10f23d4/touhou-hungry-tiger) cloud your judgment.

**CONCEPTUALIZATION** – Don't be too eager to paint the sinister undertones. It shines in subtlety.

**ELECTROCHEMISTRY** – Those veggies do look addicting though.
